control_attributes.control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to enable integrity verification of hardware components.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to perform threat and vulnerability analyses and subsequent testing/evaluation of the as-built system, component, or service.

Control Statement: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to enable integrity verification of hardware components.
